title: File:Wat Pho Temple Bangkok 1.jpg
author: Philip Nalangan
description: Wat Pho, or the Temple of the Reclining Buddha, is one of the most famous and oldest temples in Bangkok, Thailand. The temple complex includes numerous statues, buildings, and stupas. The temple's main attraction is the Reclining Buddha statue, which depicts the Buddha in his final moments before passing into Nirvana.
